tooltip.relics.guts_orb.description: A flawless orb with stark white corners, its center a deep purple that seems to pulse with a quiet, simmering anger. It radiates an unsettling aura, as if it harbors a grudge.
tooltip.relics.guts_orb.ability.guts.des: If you are under a negative effect or on fire, deal extra damage.
This relic gains 2 experience each second the user is affected by a harmful effect or is on fire.
tooltip.relics.slumbering_amulet.descrip: A simple, unremarkable necklace lacking distinction, yet something about it feels off as if it were destined for a greater purpose.
tooltip.relics.slumbering_amulet.ability: This relic brings a soothing comfort, making you feel compelled to wear it more.
While wearing the amulet, thoughts of Nether Stars fill your mind, and visions of them appear in your dreams. A strong urge to hold one begins to rise within you.
tooltip.relics.slumbering_amulet.levelin: Carrying this relic fills you with a sense of comfort, providing 1 experience point per second. This experience is not shared with other relics.
tooltip.relics.whispering_amulett.descri: Tendrils of pure light unfurl from the amulet, twisting and thrashing with frantic energy as if they are reaching for something just beyond the veil, yearning to grasp an unseen destination, a place they desperately seek.
tooltip.relics.whispering_amulett.abilit: The amulet hums softly, its whispers winding through your mind, guiding you toward a place it insists you must go.
tooltip.relics.made_in_heaven.descriptio: The amulet has unlocked its full potential, transforming into its true form. It now seems to share a bond with you.
tooltip.relics.made_in_heaven.ability.as: Made In Heaven channels its power into you, amplifying your stats.
tooltip.relics.made_in_heaven.ability.sa: Made In Heaven shields you from death, healing you up to half of your maximum HP with a cooldown.
tooltip.relics.made_in_heaven.leveling_s: The amulet is happy to spend time with you, granting it 1 experience per second. This experience is not shared with other relics.
tooltip.relics.made_in_heaven.ability.ju: Made In Heaven empowers your attacks with holy fire, causing them to deal a percentage of the enemy's maximum health as extra damage (with a minimum damage).
tooltip.relics.mass_gauntlet.description: A gauntlet with a massive iron ball affixed to it, designed to force the user's body to move in sync with their strikes. This unique design amplifies the power of each attack as the user's weight is channeled into every blow.
tooltip.relics.mass_gauntlet.ability.hea: Your attacks deal a percentage of your maximum health as extra damage.
tooltip.relics.eject_button.description: A yellow box with a red, glowing button. Engineered for "heroic and tactical" retreats.
tooltip.relics.eject_button.ability.nope: Grants speed when the user's health falls below 20%.
tooltip.relics.shieldweave_cape.descript: A cape woven with steel-like threads that adjust to the wearer's armor, covering weak spots.
The cape hardens upon impact, blocking the hit with [(Flat Chance) + (Per Armor) * armor]% chance. (max 50%).
The cape covers your weak spots, increasing your armor by a percentage.
tooltip.relics.shieldweave_cape.leveling: The cape gains 2 experience every time it blocks an attack.
tooltip.relics.axolotl_cream.description: A light pink cream. Enhances healing and smells like strawberries.
tooltip.relics.axolotl_cream.leveling_so: The cream gains 2 experience every time you heal.
tooltip.morerelics.axolotl_cream.source: Don't ask how it is made
effect.morerelics.corrosion.description: A corrosive effect that eats away at equipment, reducing armor.
effect.morerelics.static.description: Makes it so the player cannot see other players or mobs.
effect.morerelics.vulnerability.descript: Increases incoming damage by %20 per amplifier.
effect.morerelics.cyberpsychosis.descrip: Slightly increases speed and damage and enhances users Cyberware. Repeated application may cause irreversible damage.
effect.morerelics.overload.description: Slightly increases speed. Can be consumed for better Thermal Discharges in Thermoseismic Heart.
tooltip.relics.sentient_rust.description: A cluster of Ferro Comedenti fungi, a rare species of fungus which rapidly corrodes metal on contact. Commonly known as 'Sentient Rust' for its reddish hue.
tooltip.relics.sentient_rust.ability.cor: Applies an armor-corroding effect. Consecutive hits refresh the duration and stack the effect (up to 10 times). Each stack reduces armor by %5.
tooltip.relics.sentient_rust.leveling_so: The fungi gain 1 experience every time you attack.
tooltip.relics.opal_necklace.description: A silver necklace adorned with a small opal stone, traditionally gifted to travelers and soldiers venturing into barren lands, symbolizing a wish for their safety and protection.
tooltip.relics.opal_necklace.ability.bub: Protects from all damage once, then goes on cooldown.
tooltip.relics.opal_necklace.leveling_so: The necklace gains 5 experience every time you block an attack with it.
tooltip.relics.tyrant_mask.description: A brass mask once worn by a forgotten tyrant. Though his soul is long gone the mask still brims with malice, drawing restless spirits and trapping them within its dark influence.
tooltip.relics.tyrant_mask.ability.regre: The trapped souls within the mask hinder you, lowering your speed, damage, and attack speed.
tooltip.relics.tyrant_mask.ability.monot: The souls trapped within the mask regret avoiding change and living a monotonous life. Perhaps travelling with them could soothe their longing for adventure.
tooltip.relics.tyrant_mask.ability.reven: The souls trapped within the mask crave for revenge against the monsters that slayed them. Perhaps hunting monsters with them could soothe their fury.
tooltip.relics.tyrant_mask.ability.futil: The souls trapped within the mask carry the sorrow of a life spent without leaving a lasting mark. Maybe building with them will help soothe their need to create.
tooltip.relics.king_crimson.description: Freed souls burst out of the mask, changing its color and leaving a strange hole in the middle. When you look into the hole you can’t see the bottom but the other side looks solid.
tooltip.relics.king_crimson.ability.epit: Distorts time and space, rewinding you to your position from 10 seconds ago. Then goes on cooldown.
tooltip.relics.king_crimson.ability.talk:
Your attacks disrupt your target's mind, applying Weakness and Slowness with a chance. If the target is another player Static is also applied.

Static makes players unable to see other mobs and players while it is active.
tooltip.relics.king_crimson.ability.the_: The Court Of The Crimson King
When you attack, if your target’s health is below a certain threshold, they are instantly executed.
tooltip.relics.king_crimson.leveling_sou: This relic gains 10 experience every time you use Epitaph
This relic gains 2 experience every time a status effect is applied
The Court Of The Crimson King
This relic gains 3 experience every time a target is executed
tooltip.relics.crown_of_the_legend.descr: This crown embodies courage. Those who wear it inherit the legacy of a true legend, unshaken in the face of any challenge.
tooltip.relics.crown_of_the_legend.abili: Increases your damage against pig based mobs.

Grants life-steal scaling with damage and missing health.
 (1-(Current Health)/(Maximum Health)) * Damage * (Life-Steal)
tooltip.relics.crown_of_the_legend.level: This relic gains 5 experience every time a pig based mob is attacked
tooltip.relics.bionic_eye.description: A high-tech eye implant that grants the wearer the ability to seek and track targets, highlighting them even through obstacles.
tooltip.relics.bionic_eye.ability.seeker:
When activated, applies Glowing and Vulnerability effects on enemies in a block radius for a set duration.
While cyberpsychosis is active: Has no cooldown and applies Vulnerability 2 instead.
tooltip.relics.bionic_eye.leveling_sourc: This relics gains 10 experience every time you use Seeker.
tooltip.relics.bionic_eye.ability.cyberp:
Killing an enemy has a chance to trigger cyberpsychosis for a set duration.
The chance and duration stacks with other Cyberware with this ability.
tooltip.relics.thermoseismic_heart.descr: A high-tech heart implant that converts movement and vibrations into energy, powering itself and recharging its internal batteries.
tooltip.relics.thermoseismic_heart.abili: Explosions do not harm the user and instead grant a stack of Overload, with a maximum of 4 stacks.

When activated, it releases a stream of heat in a block radius, dealing damage. Stacks of Overload are consumed to amplify the fire's power and range.
While cyberpsychosis is active: The fire triggers as if the user has 2 Overload stacks when they have less and the Overload stacks are not consumed.
tooltip.relics.thermoseismic_heart.level: This relics gains 5 experience every time you use Thermal Discharge.
tooltip.relics.thermoseismic_heart.abili:
Killing an enemy has a chance to trigger cyberpsychosis for a set duration.
The chance and duration stacks with other Cyberware with this ability.
